message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it's worth a significant amount to you, and I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $10,750. I am willing to pay up to $10,500 for the product. Would this be acceptable?
